ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Charming Story
ygData.msgSnippet: Reminds me way back in the day again... my friend (wizard) got charmed by chief dunga (ogre camp) in wkarana... he when charmed was in the middle of the ogre
ygData.messageBody:
Reminds me way back in the day again... my friend (wizard) got charmed by
chief dunga (ogre camp) in wkarana... he when charmed was in the middle of
the ogre camp. Would have been a very tough CR back in those days. He was
fortunate enough to have shadowstep memmed. He kept bashing it and finally
charm let go, was getting pounded, shadowstepped out of there and quickly
gated out with minimal health left...

From that day on he steered clear of them

I used to love getting charmed by EE's when we were killing them, however
getting charmed by the noble in solb is not as funny, even less funny when
you think about your friend thats an ogre warrior of level 60 next to you,
you pray to god that he doesnt get charmed.

Minkin
Sol Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Legba Work [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: November 7, 2000 9:31 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Charming Story


Heheh Evil Eyes are EVIL!!!! (how appropriate)

Way back in the day, I was playing my troll warrior, and got charm by an EE
in E Karana (I was looking for merchants I could use). I swear the bugger
kept me charmed for about 20 minutes before killing me!!! I have never been
so scared in all my life. I thought I would never get free...



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
